readable.content: A man and two women pose outside a retail store . A short woman poses between two tall men in front of a store that 's going out of busines . Three people stand in front of a store window and smile . three people standing outside a store window with two large signs in the background Two tall men and a short woman standing in front of a store that is having a closeout
